Welcome to TendiesScraper!

What does TendiesScraper do?

TendiesScraper pulls data from posts that were created on subreddit page WallStreetBets within the past 24 hours. It then parses through the posts' titles and comments to find the 10 most mentioned stock tickers. Based on the the top 10 stocks, which are listed in bar graph, it will display further information on each stock such as company profile, latest buy/sell recommendations, and past 5 days stock performance. If the 5 days performance was positive, line graph will be shown in green, else, the line graph will be red.

Current sample size used in this project is 100 posts but will increase to 1,000 in near future.
